subject: Re: [junit] how to assert result of a void login method
msgSnippet: Generally, problems testing a behavior in your code means that it would benefit from simplification or breaking into multiple methods, each of which is easier
messageBody:
Generally, problems testing a behavior in your code means that it would
benefit from simplification or breaking into multiple methods, each of which
is easier to test independently.

The JUnit FAQ also specifically mentions testing void methods:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_4

Simon
(One of the JUnit list moderators)
